item.title: [Paper Exploration] In-Depth Analysis of the Segment Anything Model (SAM)
item.description: [Paper Exploration] In-Depth Analysis of the Segment Anything Model (SAM) Authors: Alexander Kirillov, Eric Mintun, Nikhila Ravi, Hanzi Mao, Chloe Rolland, Laura Gustafson, Tete Xiao, Spencer Whitehead, Alexander C. Berg, Wan-Yen Lo, Piotr Doll√°r, Ross Girshick Published on 2023 The Segment Anything Model (SAM) was developed by Meta AI as a foundation model for image segmentation tasks. The goal of SAM is to create a universal model that can efficiently handle various segmentation tasks with minimal prompting.
